original: de bzhin du aom yig las skyes pa ches bzang po'i gser gyis spras pa'i yu ba can bkra shis pa'i rang bzhin ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i rnga yab rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du aom yig las skyes pa ches bzang po'i gser gyis spras pa'i yu ba can bkra shis pa'i rang bzhin ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i rnga yab rnam par bsams nas /
translated: Similarly, one should visualize a yak-tail fan, which is adorned with excellent gold arisen from the letter oṃ, the nature of auspiciousness, white like the light of the autumn moon.

original: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing /

original: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te mchod pa byas nas /
translated: One should empower it with the vase water and make offerings.

original: aom tsu ru ts'a ma ri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom tsu ru ts'a ma ri sv'a h'a /

analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du lhag par gnas par bya ste rnga yab rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: One should consecrate the fly-whisk with this mantra one hundred and eight times. This is the consecration of the fly-whisk.

original: de bzhin du sim yig las skyes pa'i seng ge dang / aa yig @260b las skyes pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / kam yig las skyes pa'i rin po che'i bum pa dang / ma yig las skyes pa'i nya dang rma bya dang ri dags dang chu srin la sogs pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du sim yig las skyes pa'i seng ge dang / aa yig @260b las skyes pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / kam yig las skyes pa'i rin po che'i bum pa dang / ma yig las skyes pa'i nya dang rma bya dang ri dags dang chu srin la sogs pa dang /
translated: Similarly, one should consecrate the lion born from the syllable sim, the invincible born from the syllable am, the jeweled vase born from the syllable kam, the fish, peacock, deer, crocodile, and so on born from the syllable mam,

original: gam yig las skyes pa'i mkha' lding dang / pam yig las skyes pa'i padma dang / aa yig las skyes pa'i me long dang / aam yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang / khyu mchog dang / h'um yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang /

translated: the garuda born from the syllable gam, the lotus born from the syllable pam, the mirror born from the syllable am, the crossed vajra born from the syllable am, the bull, and the vajra born from the syllable hum.

original: tram yig las skyes pa'i rin po che dang / ham yig las skyes pa'i dang pa la sogs pas mtshan par gyur pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsams nas de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing
analyzed: tram yig las skyes pa'i rin po che dang / ham yig las skyes pa'i dang pa la sogs pas mtshan par gyur pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsams nas de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing
translated: Having visualized the pledge beings marked with jewels born from the syllable tram and lotuses born from the syllable ham, and so on, one should summon the gnosis beings resembling them with the light rays of the seed syllable at one’s heart and cause them to enter the pledge beings.

original: / bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: / bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: Having conferred empowerment with the vase water and made offerings,🔽one should perform the consecration with this mantra one hundred and eight times:

original: aom a'a:badzra dh'a dza ba ti dza yotta ri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:badzra dh'a dza ba ti dza yotta ri sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ āḥ vajra dhvaja bhaṭi jaya uttapari svāhā.

original: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du lhag par gnas par bya ste rgyal mtshan rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du lhag par gnas par bya ste rgyal mtshan rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the consecration of the victory banner.

original: de bzhin du pam yig las skyes pa 'od gsal zhing rab tu gdung ba skyed par byed pa'i dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du pam yig las skyes pa 'od gsal zhing rab tu gdung ba skyed par byed pa'i dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs rnam par bsams nas /
translated: Similarly, having visualized the form of the pledge being born from the syllable paṃ, which is clear and radiant and generates passion,

original: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing /
translated: One should summon the gnosis-being who is similar to that with light rays from the seed syllable in one’s heart and cause it to enter the commitment being.

original: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: One should confer empowerment with the vase water, and make perfect offerings.🔽One should recite this mantra one hundred and eight times:

original: aom a'a:badzra ke tu badzra pa t'a ke dhi tishtha pam sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:badzra ke tu badzra pa t'a ke dhi tishtha pam sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ āḥ vajraketu vajrapātāka idhistiṣṭha pam svāhā.

original: zhes pa 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya ste ba dan rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya ste ba dan rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the consecration of the banner.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha dang gnas kyi bdag po dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang sa'i bdag po dang glags lta ba'i skye bo dang bzo bo dang slob dpon dang chos smra ba la sogs pa rnams la bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mchod pa byas nas
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha dang gnas kyi bdag po dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang sa'i bdag po dang glags lta ba'i skye bo dang bzo bo dang slob dpon dang chos smra ba la sogs pa rnams la bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mchod pa byas nas
translated: Then, having made offerings to oneself just as before to the deities of the maṇḍala, the lords of the site, the worldly protectors, the lords of the earth, the people who watch for vulnerabilities, the craftsmen, the master, the dharma preachers, and so on,

original: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma chen po sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma chen po sbyin par bya'o //
translated: one should give the great bali according to the rite explained previously.

original: grong dang grong khyer dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa gang du mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnying pa dang gas pa dang tshig pa dang zhig pa la sogs par lha rnams gnas bar gyur na gnas der sems @261a * //
analyzed: grong dang grong khyer dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa gang du mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnying pa dang gas pa dang tshig pa dang zhig pa la sogs par lha rnams gnas bar gyur na gnas der sems @261a * //
translated: If the gods reside in any town, city, monastery, etc., in old, broken, burned, destroyed stūpas, images, banners, etc.,

original: can rnams la nor nyams pa dang 'thab rtsod dang mu ge dang skye bo rnams zad par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams 'byung bas rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga bya'o //
analyzed: can rnams la nor nyams pa dang 'thab rtsod dang mu ge dang skye bo rnams zad par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams 'byung bas rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga bya'o //
translated: then the faults of loss of wealth, quarrels, famine, and the exhaustion of people will occur for sentient beings in that place. Therefore, one should perform the ritual of removing the old.

original: de la slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa sa chu dang me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang zhal zas la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de la slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa sa chu dang me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang zhal zas la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
translated: For that, the master, endowed with the yoga of the three meditative stabilizations, should make perfect offerings with water, flowers, incense, lamps, food, etc.

original: 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: And one should make this supplication:🔽Homage to you, Blessed One, supreme vajra,

original: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog / rig sngags rgyal po khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog / rig sngags rgyal po khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: king of knowledge-mantras.

original: sems can rnams la phan phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //🔽mgon po rnying pa 'byin pa yi //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir // mgon po rnying pa 'byin pa yi //
translated: For the sake of benefiting sentient beings and for the sake of worshipping you all,🔽I wish to perform the excellent rite

original: cho ga bzang po bya par 'dod //
analyzed: cho ga bzang po bya par 'dod //
translated: of inducting the old lords.🔽I request you to enter this vase

original: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi //🔽bum pa 'dir ni gzhug par gsol //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi // bum pa 'dir ni gzhug par gsol //
translated: which is the nature of the nectar of exalted wisdom.

original: zhes so // de nas yud tsam de la nges par brtags te de'i thugs kar de'i sa bon bltas te lag pa g-yon pas bgrang phreng bzung nas /
analyzed: zhes so // de nas yud tsam de la nges par brtags te de'i thugs kar de'i sa bon bltas te lag pa g-yon pas bgrang phreng bzung nas /
translated: Then, in that very moment, one should definitely examine the seed syllable in his heart, and holding the rosary with the left hand,

original: de la bcings pa'i srad bu lnga dang rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste /
analyzed: de la bcings pa'i srad bu lnga dang rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste /
translated: one should hold with the right hand the thread bound to it, together with the vajra,

original: rang rang gi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzla zhing ho: yig gnyis dang spel ba'i sa bon rnam par gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzla zhing ho: yig gnyis dang spel ba'i sa bon rnam par gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and one should cause the seed syllable to enter, repeating one's own mantra one hundred and eight times, alternating with the two syllables ho and om.

original: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg byas nas thag pa rnams kyis bcings te khyu mchog gi 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg byas nas thag pa rnams kyis bcings te khyu mchog gi 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having performed the homa rite as previously explained, one should bind the ropes and shake them with the machine of the bull, and so forth.

original: de nas bum pa de sa phyogs dben par bzhag ste me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bum pa de sa phyogs dben par bzhag ste me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having placed that vase in an isolated place, one should make offerings to it with flowers and so forth.

original: mchod rten la sogs pa rdo'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / grub pa dang zhig pa de ni chu mang po yod pa'i chu klung du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod rten la sogs pa rdo'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / grub pa dang zhig pa de ni chu mang po yod pa'i chu klung du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Whatever is made of stone, such as a stūpa, and is broken or destroyed, one should place it in a river with a strong current.

original: sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la sogs pa gang dang gang 'du bya bar mi bzod par rnams ni de nyid du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la sogs pa gang dang gang 'du bya bar mi bzod par rnams ni de nyid du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Whatever is made of earth, such as a stūpa, and is unable to be repaired, one should place it there.

original: gang dang gang shing las byas pa'i rnying pa dang zhig pa de dang de ni mar gyis bsgos te ras kyis dkris nas sbyin sreg gi mes bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: gang dang gang shing las byas pa'i rnying pa dang zhig pa de dang de ni mar gyis bsgos te ras kyis dkris nas sbyin sreg gi mes bsreg par bya'o //
translated: Whatever is old and broken, made of wood, one should burn it in the fire of the homa rite, having anointed it with ghee and wrapped it in cloth.

original: gang zhig zangs la sogs pa las byas pa de ni bzhu nas sngar gyi tshad las mi dman par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig zangs la sogs pa las byas pa de ni bzhu nas sngar gyi tshad las mi dman par bya'o //
translated: If it is made of copper and so forth, it should be melted and made not less than the former size.

original: mchod rten la sogs pa de dag grub nas mchod yon la sogs pa'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bum par bzhag pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi ye @261b shes sems dpa' phyung nas mchod rten la sogs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug
analyzed: mchod rten la sogs pa de dag grub nas mchod yon la sogs pa'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bum par bzhag pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi ye @261b shes sems dpa' phyung nas mchod rten la sogs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug
translated: After those stūpas and so forth are completed, having first made offerings of water for drinking and so forth, the gnosis being, which is the nature of the gnosis nectar previously placed in the vase, is extracted and inserted into the pledge being of the stūpa and so forth.

original: par bya zhing de la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: par bya zhing de la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
translated: It is consecrated with the water of the vase.

original: de nas rang rang gi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de nas rang rang gi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Then, it is consecrated one hundred and eight times with its own mantra.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas me'i mchod pa dang rab tu gnas pa yang bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas me'i mchod pa dang rab tu gnas pa yang bya'o //
translated: The fire offering and consecration should also be performed by the procedure previously explained.

original: rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The ritual for removing the old.

original: gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga 'di'i rgya dpe gnyal gyi phyogs nas rnyed do //
analyzed: gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga 'di'i rgya dpe gnyal gyi phyogs nas rnyed do //
translated: The ritual for the consecration of parasols and so forth and the ritual for removing the old were found in the Nyal region.

original: bstan pa rin po che la phul du byung ba'i gces spras su mdzad pa mtshungs med chos kyi rje rin po che zhva dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong bzang
analyzed: bstan pa rin po che la phul du byung ba'i gces spras su mdzad pa mtshungs med chos kyi rje rin po che zhva dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong bzang
translated: The incomparable lord of Dharma, the precious one with the red shoes, the fourth holder of the crown, said, Please translate the precious teachings into Tibetan.

original: pos dpal sne'u gdong rtser bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: pos dpal sne'u gdong rtser bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Accordingly, the Zhalu translator, the monk Chökyong Zangpo, translated it at the glorious Neu Dongtse.
